com.cyc.base

Interface CycAccess

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CycClient

    public interface CycAccess

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the CycConnection object. Modified by APB to be able to handle multiple calls to close() safely.

      • cyclifyString

        String cyclifyString(String str)
                     throws CycConnectionException,
                            CycApiException
        Adds #$ to string for all CycConstantIs mentioned in the string that don't already have them
        Parameters:
        str - the String that will have #$'s added to it.
        Returns:
        a copy of str with #$'s added where appropriate.
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if cyc server host not found on the network or a data communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if the api request results in a cyc server error

      • getCycConnection

        CycConnectionInterface getCycConnection()
        Returns the CycConnection object.
        Returns:
        the CycConnection object

      • getCycImageID

        String getCycImageID()
                     throws CycConnectionException,
                            CycApiException
        Returns the Cyc image ID.
        Returns:
        the Cyc image ID string
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communications error occurs or the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error

      • getCycLeaseManager

        @Deprecated
LeaseManager getCycLeaseManager()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the Cyc api services lease manager.
        Returns:
        the Cyc api services lease manager

      • getCycServer

        CycServer getCycServer()
        Gets the CycServer description of the server to which this CycAccess is connected.
        Returns:
        a CycServer object

      • getHostName

        @Deprecated
String getHostName()
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the hostname of the connection deprecated, use getCycServer().getHostName()
        Returns:
        the hostname of the connection

      • getBasePort

        @Deprecated
int getBasePort()
        Deprecated. 
        gets the baseport of the connection deprecated, use getCycServer().getBasePort()
        Returns:
        the baseport of the connection

      • getHttpPort

        @Deprecated
int getHttpPort()
        Deprecated. 
        deprecated, use getCycServer().getHttpPort()
        Returns:
        the http of server the connection is connected to.

      • getReestablishClosedConnections

        boolean getReestablishClosedConnections()

      • hasStaticCycServer

        boolean hasStaticCycServer()
        Does this CycAccess access a single Cyc?
        Returns:
        true if this CycAccess will always access the same Cyc server, and returns false if the CycAccess was constructed with a Comm object that may result in different calls being sent to different Cyc servers.

      • hasValidLease

        boolean hasValidLease()
        Returns whether or not we have a valid lease with the Cyc server.
        Returns:
        whether or not we have a valid lease with the Cyc server

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Returns whether the connection is closed
        Returns:
        whether the connection is closed

      • isOpenCyc

        boolean isOpenCyc()
                  throws CycConnectionException
        Returns true if this KB is an OpenCyc image.
        Returns:
        true if this KB is an OpenCyc image, otherwise false
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a data communication error occurs or the Cyc server cannot be found

      • maybeAddLoginRedirect

        String maybeAddLoginRedirect(String urlString,
                           Fort cyclist,
                           DenotationalTerm applicationTerm)
        Try to enhance urlString to log cyclist in and redirect to the page it would otherwise go to directly.

      • requireNonOpenCyc

        void requireNonOpenCyc()
                       throws CycConnectionException
        Verify that this is not an OpenCyc image.
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if we can't communicate with Cyc.
        UnsupportedOperationException - if it is an OpenCyc image.

      • setReadableNarts

        void setReadableNarts()
                      throws CycConnectionException,
                             CycApiException
        Sets the print-readable-narts feature on.
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if cyc server host not found on the network or the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the api request results in a cyc server error

      • setReestablishClosedConnections

        void setReestablishClosedConnections(boolean value)

        void traceOff()
        Turns off the diagnostic trace of socket messages.

        Turns on the diagnostic trace of socket messages.

        Turns on the detailed diagnostic trace of socket messages.

      • getCycSession

        CycSession getCycSession()
        Returns the CycSession object wrapping this CycAccess instance. If this CycAccess was created independently of the Session API, this method will return null.
